text: int main ( ) { int numOfTriangles = 0 , numOfLines , i , j , a , x , y , max = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & numOfTriangles ) ; while ( numOfTriangles > 0 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & numOfLines ) ; int * * base = ( int * * ) malloc ( numOfLines * sizeof ( int * ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < numOfLines ; i ++ ) { base [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( ( i + 1 ) * sizeof ( int ) ) ; j = 0 ; while ( j <= i ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a ) ; if ( i == 0 ) base [ i ] [ j ] = a ; else if ( j == 0 ) base [ i ] [ j ] = a + base [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; else if ( j == numOfLines - 1 ) base [ i ] [ j ] = a + base [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; else { x = a + base [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; y = a + base [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; if ( x > y ) base [ i ] [ j ] = x ; else base [ i ] [ j ] = y ; } j ++ ; } } max = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j < numOfLines ; j ++ ) { if ( max < base [ numOfLines - 1 ] [ j ] ) max = base [ numOfLines - 1 ] [ j ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; free ( base ) ; numOfTriangles -- ; } return 0 ; }
